text: Judan anabamɨn gumazamizir izava Jerusalemɨn itibar dɨbobonim, a 690ɨn tu. Men gumazir dapanir mamɨn ziam, Utai. Utai, a Amihutɨn otarim, ezɨ Amihut, a Omrin otarim, ezɨ Omri, a Imrin otarim, ezɨ Imri, a Banin otarim. Gumazir kaba, Judan otarim Peresɨn ovavir boriba. Ezɨ Selan adarazir tongɨn, an otarir ivariam Asaia, a Judabar gumazir dapanim. Ezɨ gumazir dapanir igharazir mam, Juel, a Seran ovavir borim, ezɨ Sera, a Judan otarim.
